testcase.name: avst_tools_installations Should create resources passed as tarballs to install should not contain Avst_tools_installations::Avst_package_to_install[]
avst_tools_installations Should create resources passed as packages to install should not contain Avst_tools_installations::Avst_tarball_to_install[]
avst_tools_installations::avst_package_to_install Should install package and not create script by default should not contain File[]
avst_tools_installations::avst_tarball_to_install Should download tar from url, extract it and not create script by default should not contain File[]

avst_tools_installations::avst_tarball_to_install Should download tar from url, extract it and create script should contain File[/tmp/script.sh] with ensure => "file", owner => "root", group => "root" and mode => "0755"
